Formula.name: Formula
Formula.hint: The formula that will be added to the chat.

Row.name: Row
Row.hint: The row the button will be placed on.

Label.name: Label
Label.hint: (Optional) The label shown in case the dice has no image.

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.hint: (Optional) The tooltip shown when hovering over the button. Defaults to the Formula.

Color.name: Color
Color.hint: (Optional) The color that fills the image. Defaults to white.

DiceRows.Instruction1: Click any dice button to edit it.
DiceRows.Instruction2: Right-Click any dice button to delete it.

autoOpenPopout.name: Auto Open Popout
autoOpenPopout.hint: Opens the Dice Tray popout automatically on page load.

enableDiceTray.name: Dice Tray有効化
enableDiceTray.hint: チャットメッセージの下にダイス･トレイを表示します (再読み込みが必要です)｡

enableDiceCalculator.name: ダイス電卓有効化
enableDiceCalculator.hint: チャットボックスの左上にある20面体アイコンをクリックするとダイス電卓が出現するようになります。（要再読み込み）

popout.name: Add button to popout Dice Tray
popout.hint: Adds a button on the Controls bar to toggle the Dice Tray popout. You can also toggle the popout by setting a keybinding.

wildDieBehavior.name: Use Dice Pool for Wild Button
wildDieBehavior.hint: Clicking the same dice while Wild is active will add dice to the pool rather than increasing the current dice in the list.
